scenario_text.value:
Yeah, I just... I still have no idea what
you’re saying. Sorry, Kunemon.

You’re apologizing? Hmph, what an idiot.
Heheh, haha...

Hey, don’t make fun of me. Kunemon might
understand exactly what I’m saying.

What? Like anyone’s listening to what you
have to say. Heheh, yeah, nobody’s listening.
Huh? Ryo, what are you talking about?!

Yeah, right. Not a chance. You, me, it
doesn’t matter. Nobody cares.

I- I don’t know... Heheh, yes, that’s it...
All in my head... Heheh, that’s all this is.

Um, Agumon? Do you think Ryo is actually
talking with Kunemon?

That’s what it looks like, but...I don’t know
if Ryo realizes what’s happening.

(I wonder what Kunemon is saying. Somehow,
I don’t think Ryo is going to tell me.)

Heh, Heheheh... See? That’s the problem with
you... Heheheh...
